solution_line_template: Tammy picks {num_trees} trees x {oranges_per_tree_per_day} oranges/tree = <<{num_trees}*{oranges_per_tree_per_day}={oranges_per_day}>>{oranges_per_day} oranges per day.
Tammy sells {oranges_per_day} oranges/day / {oranges_per_pack} oranges/pack = <<{oranges_per_day}/{oranges_per_pack}={packs_per_day}>>{packs_per_day} 6-packs of oranges a day
Tammy sells {packs_per_day} packs/day x {days_per_week} days/week = <<{packs_per_day}*{days_per_week}={packs_per_week}>>{packs_per_week} 6-packs a week
In {num_weeks} weeks Tammy sells {packs_per_week} packs/week x {num_weeks} weeks = <<{packs_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_packs_sold}>>{total_packs_sold} 6 -packs
